main event: Two observers in Margate, New Jersey, reported seeing an object moving straight across the sky for 12 seconds.
interesting points: The observers were only 8 years old at the time of the sighting., The object trailed exhaust as it moved., There were no navigation lights observed on the object., The object was classified as an Astro (KEFREN) in conclusion., The observers reported the object appeared whitish gray.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with exhaust trail
